descriptionText: NAS file system resources (`alicloud_nas_file_system`) must include the `encrypt_type` attribute set to `"2"` to enable user-managed KMS encryption. The rule reports a `MissingAttribute` issue when `encrypt_type` is absent, and an `IncorrectValue` issue when it is present but not set to `"2"`. To remediate, ensure that `encrypt_type` is explicitly set to `"2"`.
